    𝗩𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗰𝗲 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽 𝗺𝗲𝗲𝘁 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀 at Swissôtel The Bosphorus, Istanbul
𝗧𝗼𝗴𝗲𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗿 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗲𝘅𝗰𝗹𝘂𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗽𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗻𝗲𝗿 𝗔𝘃𝗲𝗻𝘀, we had the pleasure of hosting a highly successful seminar, spotlighting:

✅𝗙𝗶𝗿𝗲-𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗲𝘅𝗽𝗹𝗼𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻-𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗼𝗳 𝗳𝗮𝗻𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗶𝗻𝗻𝗼𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝘁𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆
✅𝗖𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗳𝘂𝗴𝗮𝗹 𝗳𝗮𝗻𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮𝗽𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗹𝗼𝘄 𝗻𝗼𝗶𝘀𝗲 𝗲𝗺𝗶𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀
✅𝗜𝗻-𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗲 𝗳𝗮𝗻𝘀 𝗳𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘀𝗶𝗹𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘁𝗼𝗽 𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗶𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗺𝗮𝗿𝗸𝗲𝘁

The event brought together industry professionals to exchange knowledge, discover innovative products, and explore practical applications for safety-critical and high-performance ventilation systems.

A heartful thank you to AVENS HAVALANDIRMA SİSTEMLERİ A.Ş. and all participants for making this event a true success.

Together, we’re shaping the future of ventilation solutions!

    ATEX and F400 solutions Seminar at Swissôtel The Bosphorus, Istanbul
We had the pleasure of hosting a highly successful seminar, spotlighting:
• ATEX & F400 Casals fans for safe and reliable ventilation in demanding environments, by our colleague @Leonardo Calamita.
• Quadro EVO, a state-of-the-art solution combining performance and versatility.
• LINEO QUIET, setting new standards in silent, high-efficiency ventilation.

The event brought together industry professionals to exchange knowledge, discover innovative products, and explore practical applications for safety-critical and high-performance ventilation systems.

A heartfelt thank you to AVENS HAVALANDIRMA SİSTEMLERİ A.Ş. and all participants for making this event a true success.

Together, we’re shaping the future of ventilation solutions!
